name: Hen in the Foxhouse
description:
A Chicken rampage is about to sweep through Fox City!
Defeat the foxes of Fox City and destroy their infrastructure by throwing eggs. Originally made for Newgrounds July Jam 2021 with the theme 'egg', but updated with new features.
  • Be a Chicken!
  • Lay eggs!
  • Crush the political and economical structures that hold up Fox society!
